item.title: Contemporary Water Feature in Great Falls
item.dc:creator: Land & Water Design
item.description:
A contemporary water feature with stainless steel pergola with round concrete support columns to replicate the house architecture. Our client wanted a one of the kind water feature where you could experience it by stepping from one concrete platform to the next. The largest platform will accommodate a few friends on the “L” shape […]
